title: What’s in Alexis Mabille’s suitcase? My silver Turkish belt follows me wherever I go
text:
What’s in Alexis Mabille’s suitcase? My silver Turkish belt follows me wherever I go Monday August 10, 2015 
French fashion designer Alexis Mabille. — AFP pic PARIS, Aug 10 — With summer vacations in full swing, we interviewed Alexis Mabille on the staples of his summer wardrobe and his personal secrets for having a 100 per cent fashion vacation. 
The French designer admitted to never going on vacation without his silver Turkish belt. 
What three things must you have with you on vacation? 
An old pashmina, my Le Gramme bracelets and Spartan sandals. 
What item from your wardrobe do you bring with you no matter where you vacation? 
My silver Turkish belt. 
Do you have a beauty tip to look your best on vacation? 
Drink lots of water and exfoliate every night so your tan looks great. 
Do you have an unusual story from a past vacation? 
I found myself on a boat between two Greek islands with the model from Aqua Di Giò (Giorgio Armani cologne, ed). 
Who do you dream of going on vacation with? 
Marie-Antoinette. — AFP-Relaxnews
